short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple extension that allows you to stream your desktop into meetings with pimentaLIVE.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
pimentaLIVE is a simple extension that allows you to schedule pimentaGROUP-Meetings and stream your desktop into video with telephone calls conferences.
pimentaLIVE is an application that provides secure, high quality, scalable video conferences.

You can try it out yourself at: https://goo.gl/Ap3iq9

This extension provides the pimenta.group site with desktop streaming functionality over Chrome.
